clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Levetiracetam in Partial Seizures Control, With or Without Secondary Generalization
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Phase III, Multicenter, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Levetiracetam as Adjunctive Therapy, in Partial Seizures Control Associated With Refractory Focal Epilepsy

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether levetiracetam as adjunctive therapy is effective in the treatment of partial seizures, with or without secondary generalization, associated with refractory focal epilepsy.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Partial onset seizure frequency per week.
primary_outcome.description: Collection of seizure count throughout the whole study

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety descriptive about occurence of adverse events, evaluation of results of clinical/physical examination and ECG and laboratory tests results.
secondary_outcome.description: Collection of safety data throughout the whole study period

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportions of response between the groups of treatment. (Responders defined as number of patients with at least 50% reduction in the number of weekly partial seizures)
secondary_outcome.description: Comparative between baseline and treatment periods

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage reduction from baseline in partial seizure frequency of days a week.
secondary_outcome.description: Comparative between baseline and treatment periods

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of response between the groups of treatment. (Responders defined as number of subjects with at least 50% reduction in the number of days per week with partial seizures)
secondary_outcome.description: Comparative between baseline and treatment periods

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion between the groups of treatment without any kind of seizures. (seizure free)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the titration period (period with stable regimen of the drug)
secondary_outcome.description: During the evaluation period of treatment, without the titration period

intervention.description: Oral solution (Each mL contains 100mg of levetiracetam) or immediate-release tablets (Tablets containing 500mg or 1000mg of levetiracetam)
Placebo, properly standardized to suit the characteristics of each dosage form (oral solution and tablets) of levetiracetam
